sample_docs: ZK Tech Biometric Products Time & Attendance, Access Control ZK Tech is a multinational enterprise, that specialises in the manufacture and development of time and attendance and access control technology. H8 is a friendly use plug-in solution for time and attendance recording using fingerprints. 3" TFT screen, functions keys to select in and out, scheduled-bell, SMS, etc. Stores up to 500 fingerprint templates & up to 50,000 log records. USB download data when in standalone mode. SD Card, USB-Host, USB-client. Only £124.99 ex VAT (£149.99 inc VAT) Part no. iclockh8 Manufacturer Product Detail: iClock H8 iClock-560 is a Time & Attendance terminal with incorporated fingerprint sensor and display. Stores up to 30,000 users and 8,000 templates. Stores up to 200,000 log records without PC download. USB data download in standalone mode. TCP/IP port to communicate with PC Only £216.66 ex VAT (£259.99 inc VAT) Part no. iclock560 Manufacturer Product Detail: iClock 560 iClock-660 is a Time & Attendance terminal with incorporated fingerprint sensor and display. Easy to install and with a modern design. It incorporates 1,3M pixels camera for taking user photos and sending black/white photos lists to the server. The color TFT display offers users easy menu management. Only £316.66 ex VAT (£379.99 inc VAT) Part no. iclock660 Manufacturer Product Detail: iClock 660 iClock-680 is based on ZEM600 platform allowing more memory capacity and professional firmware functions. Connects to Time & Attendance management software by Ethernet, USB (also works by Wifi and GPRS) or operates standalone, downloading data by USB pendrive. Only £333.33 ex VAT (£399.99 inc VAT) Part no. iclock680 Manufacturer Product Detail: iClock 680 iClock700 is a Time & Attendance and access control terminal with incorporated ZK fingerprint sensor, 3'5 TFT display and internal backup battery. Easy to install, and with a modern design, it is the perfect solution for all kinds of installations. The iClock 700 includes an internal battery and Fingerprint cover. Only £358.33 ex VAT (£429.99 inc VAT) Part no. iclock700 Manufacturer Product Detail: iClock 700 VF380 is a new generation facial identification terminal, with Face, RFID and PIN Recognition mode. With latest facial algorithm ZK Face 7.0 and large capacity ZEM810 platform, it holds 200 face templates without dividing groups, and its verification time is less than 1 second. Only £291.66 ex VAT (£349.99 inc VAT) Part no. VF380 Manufacturer Product Detail: VF380 Users can identify or verify themsleves either by face, finger, card ID or PIN/Password. The TFT color touch screen of MulitiBio 700 provides ease of use and a rich user experience. It uses state of the art 3D imaging technology while also providing hygienic 100% touch-free biometric authentication. Only £333.33 ex VAT (£399.99 inc VAT) Part no. MB700 Manufacturer Product Detail: MB700 TF1700 is a small IP-based fingerprint terminals used for access control and time attendance. With its IP65 rated rugged waterproof and weatherproof structure, Offers durability for weather conditions including outdoors. Standalone applications such as house, office, shop, garage, factory and others. Only £333.33 ex VAT (£399.99 inc VAT) Part no. TF1700 Manufacturer Product Detail: TF1700 MA300 is an innovative biometric fingerprint reader for access control applications, offering high performance, reliability, precision and excellent matching speed. Features the fastest commercial-based fingerprint matching algorithm and high quality optical sensor. Great for Education sector Only £208.33 ex VAT (£249.99 inc VAT) Part no. MA300 Manufacturer Product Detail: MA300 SCR-100 is an access control terminal with incorporated proximity reader (EM by default). It's the perfect solution for small and medium access control installations. Connects to access control management software by Ethernet or RS232/485 port. Also operates in standalone mode via USB pendrive. Only £124.99 ex VAT (£149.99 inc VAT) Part no. SCR-100 Manufacturer Product Detail: SCR-100 L5000 Intelligent Fingerprint Lock The fingerprint lock offers state of the art single door management solution that provides you with unmatched options. Comes with OLED, standard USB interface. Only £191.66 ex VAT (£229.99 inc VAT) Part no. ZKL5000 Manufacturer Product Detail: L5000 L4000 Intelligent Fingerprint Lock The fingerprint lock offers state of the art single door management solution that provides you with unmatched options. Comes with OLED, standard USB interface. Only £191.66 ex VAT (£229.99 inc VAT) Part no. ZKL4000 Manufacturer Product Detail: L4000 For more information on ZK Technology Biometric Time & Attendance and Access Control solutions please contact us .

ZKTeco CCTV. Get Sharper. Blog by Andy | Posted on Wednesday December 11 2019 Introducing the all-new ZKTeco CCTV range. We know and love ZKTeco as a leading provider of security and time management solutions. Their multi-biometric time & attendance and access control devices are robust and reliable, and they are immensely popular with our customers. Crystal clear images. Even at night. Now, ZKTeco have recently launched a range of cost efficient, high-quality IP CCTV cameras with cutting-edge Sony STARVIS sensors . These cameras deliver crystal clear images with a 20m viewing range. They also support the industry-leading IVA smart event alarm. As well as a great range of dome and bullet cameras available with Power over Ethernet (PoE), night-vision capability and resolutions of up to 4MP, there are DVRs for recording and managing footage with up to 16 channels at 4K and H265+ video compression for high quality video but efficient data storage. H.265+ is the evolutionary optimisation of H.265 and traditional H.264 and includes a series of encoding strategies such as Dynamic ROI and smart 2D&3D noise reduction. The friendly GUI provides intuitive shortcut operations, remote control and management, flexible storage and playback. It's widely used for government, banking, manufacturing, educational and commercial projects. Smart. And tough. Cameras allow detection on multiple behaviours including Tripwire, Intrusion, Objects Detection and Target Counting. Camera working temperatures range from -30°C to +60 °C and in a variety of harsh outdoor environments. The ZKTeco CCTV range is ideal for business use in office, production or retail settings and provides sharp playback for security and evidence purposes. Flexible management. You can manage your CCTV cameras via the AntarView mobile app or via input the IP address of the front-end device in your chosen internet browser. You can then monitor live video as easily as opening a website. We like them so much, we've dedicated a whole new section of our site to them. We think you'll like them too: Check out the new CCTV range from ZKTeco ZKTeco CCTV. Get Sharper. Blog by Andy | Posted on Wednesday December 11 2019 Introducing the all-new ZKTeco CCTV range. We know and love ZKTeco as a leading provider of security and time management solutions. Their multi-biometric time & attendance and access control devices are robust and reliable, and they are immensely popular with our customers. Crystal clear images. Even at night. Now, ZKTeco have recently launched a range of cost efficient, high-quality IP CCTV cameras with cutting-edge Sony STARVIS sensors . These cameras deliver crystal clear images with a 20m viewing range. They also support the industry-leading IVA smart event alarm. As well as a great range of dome and bullet cameras available with Power over Ethernet (PoE), night-vision capability and resolutions of up to 4MP, there are DVRs for recording and managing footage with up to 16 channels at 4K and H265+ video compression for high quality video but efficient data storage. H.265+ is the evolutionary optimisation of H.265 and traditional H.264 and includes a series of encoding strategies such as Dynamic ROI and smart 2D&3D noise reduction. The friendly GUI provides intuitive shortcut operations, remote control and management, flexible storage and playback. It's widely used for government, banking, manufacturing, educational and commercial projects. Cameras allow detection on multiple behaviours including Tripwire, Intrusion, Objects Detection and Target Counting. Camera working temperatures range from -30°C to +60 °C and in a variety of harsh outdoor environments. The ZKTeco CCTV range is ideal for business use in office, production or retail settings and provides sharp playback for security and evidence purposes. You can manage your CCTV cameras via the AntarView mobile app or via input the IP address of the front-end device in your chosen internet browser. You can then monitor live video as easily as opening a website. We like them so much, we've dedicated a whole new section of our site to them. We think you'll like them too: Check out the new CCTV range from ZKTeco In good company: some of Idency's clients

Feed You can now export your Malwarebytes data directly to Microsoft Excel Malwarebytes truly is a conquering cybersecurity provider and continues to add to their warrior-like strategies. But, doesn't every cybersecurity provider consider themselves hero's? How can we be sure to put our trust in Malwarebytes? Malwarebytes gives triallists an opportunity Triallists of Malwarebytes can now generate summary reports that demonstrate exactly how Malwarebytes has protected your network, and this is how they got there... Malwarebytes Cloud & On-Premise solutions have always collected a rich set of data from your connected endpoints in order for you to have full control and flexibility of your security. A common request has since surfaced to turn this rich set of collected data into useful information... Malwarebytes introduce the Malwarebytes Excel Addin. Providing easy access to import data directly into Microsoft Excel. To make everything easier, all you need for the Malwarebytes Excel Addin to work is: An account on the Malwarebytes Cloud server ( https://cloud.malwarebytes.com ). Microsoft Excel 2013 or 2016 (Office 365) on Windows. This means it doesn't matter if you own a Malwarebytes licence or not, you can try it today. The process of combining Malwarebytes with Excel is very simple. All you need to do is download the addin, and the addin adds a completely new Malwarebytes window to your Excel. Malwarebytes Excel Addin Features & Benefits Malwarebytes Excel Addin has a variety of features and benefits that give customers a wide range of possibilities and freedom. Haven't Purchased Malwarebytes Yet? Try Malwarebytes now & test your network free! REQUEST A FREE TRIAL Want to Download Malwarebytes Excel? Download Malwarebytes Excel Addin Now! DOWNLOAD Malwarebytes Excel Addin in Action With Malwarebytes Excel Addin you can perform a range of actions, including importing endpoint data, import software installed & agent information, generate summary reports for an overview of activity since Malwarebytes was installed and import detections & threats data. Excel Addin Photo Gallery Hover over the images for a description. Click the images to enlarge them. Perform a variety of actions Tables & charts created for key objects Import detections & threat data Generate summary reports Want a tour of the Malwarebytes Excel Addin? Watch this 4 minute video to see how quick and easy it is to download, import/export, and generate reports. Want more screenshots, videos and information on Malwarebytes? Check out our Malwarebytes product listings for datasheets, user manuals, operational videos, and detailed product descriptions. You can also check out our Knowledgebase for more information. Malwarebytes Knowledgebase We Can Support You For more information and to discuss your requirements, please contact us. In today's networked and mobile world it's essential that people and companies are set up to manage and protect their data, communications and resources. We make that possible. Authentication & Biometric Solutions People can be careless – and we all have off-days. More than 60% of business managers share passwords with others! Strong authentication, time & attendance and access control solutions using biometrics or RFID stop unauthorised personnel in their tracks. Our solutions make strong security simple, practical and affordable. Even better – we take human error out of your security. Proven market leading security solutions, extra layers of protection and educating users all help eliminate the risk of your systems or precious data being compromised. Our solutions make strong security simple, practical and affordable. Even better – we take human error out of your security. We live and breathe the industry, and we share our expertise in our IT Services . We can even help you discover your vulnerabilities (via an IT Audit ), and then find best solutions to fill any gaps.
